channel.title: c++ on Krishnakumar Chandran
channel.description: Recent content in c++ on Krishnakumar Chandran

item.title: Lead Data Engineer, ThorDrive Inc
item.description:
Work Experience

Full-time

Cincinnati, Ohio

Mar 2022 to Mar 2023

Highlights

  • Designed an internal Big Data platform to collect and store Petabytes of ROS bag data, live vehicle telemetry, and operator log data from autonomous tractors, improving data capacity by 250 times.
  • Built data search, visualization, snapshot, parse, label, query, clip, and download features in the above platform, improving data workflow time efficiency by 91.4%.
  • Architected data pipelines with ELK stack for troubleshooting Vehicle computers, reducing vehicle crashes by 90%.

item.title: Perception Engineer, ThorDrive Inc
item.description:
Work Experience

Full-time

Cincinnati, Ohio, US

Oct 2021 to Mar 2022

Highlights

  • Developed FLIR thermal camera grabber ROS Node for perception stack
  • Developed Lidar segmentation, Lidar Tracker and Sensor fusion algorithm for autonomous tractor
  • Worked on Lidar ground segmentation algorithm by following state-of-art research papers
  • Worked on enhancement of PointPillar and mmdetection3d Deep learning models for 3D Object detection
  • Trained and deployed Yolo v4 model for detection of pedestrian, Cones, K-Loader and airplanes
  • Worked on sensor fusion of 5 RBG cameras and 2 Lidars
